LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="f47e2384bf3b44edac5bbd4c6a1405ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf06"/]Chewy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] from Satella Travel![etc:Wait frame="15"/] "Excellent
adventures for every customer!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f47e2384bf3b44edac5bbd4c6a1405ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I'm terribly sorry for any inconvenience
I've caused you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f47e2384bf3b44edac5bbd4c6a1405ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realize we only just met under
unusual circumstances,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I must ask...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f47e2384bf3b44edac5bbd4c6a1405ff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you know if this rescue thing is covered
by insurance?
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="e351c5b5bd9b4806831a397245e096d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh, I got a bit ahead of myself there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] As
someone who works in the field,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you
probably can't answer that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e351c5b5bd9b4806831a397245e096d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]We'll just assume the cost depends on the
specific circumstances for now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could I
trouble you to look into the policy later?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e351c5b5bd9b4806831a397245e096d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]We came here on my company's Uncharted
Planet Tour,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and right now I need to
ensure that our guests are safe.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e351c5b5bd9b4806831a397245e096d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Since you have the skills,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I bet you could
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]track down our missing guests[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I offer
compensation and considerable gratitude.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="54060cd66eeb4108aa8652f233ba0b9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The future of our company rests in your
hands now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please bring all of our guests
back safely!
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="5c5e6b6609c14a73bff41072a85f9300" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Can I include a tip for the Rescue Corps
officers in miscellaneous expenses,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or will
I need to force it through another way...
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="15d19c19e9db493cbbd3a12717244d72" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You feel like I'm pressuring you to rescue
our guests?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15d19c19e9db493cbbd3a12717244d72" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/]Of course not![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would never do such
a thing!
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="6f0cc7bf31f54e3288f34aaf247fac7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]The longer the rescue drags on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more
it's going to cost...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6f0cc7bf31f54e3288f34aaf247fac7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh, I didn't say anything![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Don't
mind me!
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="e7c4f43c01c444dda9ea4a946148a8b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]By comparing the names to my roster of
tour participants,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I confirmed on my end
that everyone was rescued!
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="f0604fcca2e645c3bffac6a94ece9ff5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It isn't much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but please accept that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh,
and if it's not too much hassle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] could
you provide a receipt later?
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="500b70f1f78c443987f0cd984c3c0e55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I got a bit ahead of myself there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] As
someone who works in the field,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you
probably can't answer that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="500b70f1f78c443987f0cd984c3c0e55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Now then...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The most important thing is to
verify whether the customers who came
on the tour are safe and accounted for.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="500b70f1f78c443987f0cd984c3c0e55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You what?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You already saved them all?![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess we no longer have to plan for
the worst-case scenario.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="1e7cddedf7bf453f84a7523c2933bd07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It isn't much,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but please accept that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh,
and if it's not too much hassle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] could
you provide a receipt later?
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="1e281ffd9f3f4f8ba1a507120cf9e8da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] supervises Alayon Academy's
Planetary Science Club.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She'll probably be
the subject of blame and finger-pointing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1e281ffd9f3f4f8ba1a507120cf9e8da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]I'm worried about that too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I already have a twisting anxiety forming
in my stomach...
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="e411ef30e1514257bc073d51087dc819" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is one of the science-club students,
right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She was so calm and collected when
I met her that I thought she was in charge.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="56d48d35bd304a179be46e4abe1a62eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was the one providing the in-flight
meals.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="56d48d35bd304a179be46e4abe1a62eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]When I walked past, I saw [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf14"/]Lapi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s plate and...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]my face.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="56d48d35bd304a179be46e4abe1a62eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The representation was so photorealistic
that I couldn't believe it was drawn using
sauce.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I nearly dropped a plate.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="10d2cd63bc9c4f43baa9155ee02bef0a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It seems [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] got the tour meeting place
wrong,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gave her a good
scolding for it.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="cf0e33366fac4c28a35c001cbeffa10d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It's a little embarrassing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'm afraid I
haven't ever had an opportunity to see
any of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf16"/]Boris[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s work.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="8772a6ef3264455ea024677735872277" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal23"/]Horatio[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope it isn't rude of me to
say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but he comes across a bit...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]cagey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
don't you think?
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="0c47685c118f4b2e90f3ac65cd4b040a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] looks so much like my boss.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
hard to believe she's only a student given
how she's mastered the art of disciplining.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0c47685c118f4b2e90f3ac65cd4b040a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]When I think about how upset my boss
might be once I make it back safely...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0c47685c118f4b2e90f3ac65cd4b040a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't dwell on that right now.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="35a812c7d4254a2c81594c786bb8644c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf07"/]Molly[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was a bit unsettled when she left
her seat to record a video while we were
traveling faster than the speed of light.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="d898bc2985464d76bf3e511ebb038140" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Our company pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf08"/]Santi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], is a temp hire
with amazing skills.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He has some very
impressive experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d898bc2985464d76bf3e511ebb038140" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]It seems like he's changed careers a lot
due to frequent surprise encounters with
a rival he's been trying to avoid.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="f6b3bf763de14ce29a397a5461f9ea37" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've been building my career since I joined
the company as a new graduate.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] For my
efforts to result in something like this...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6b3bf763de14ce29a397a5461f9ea37" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But I don't think my focus was wrong...
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="b4952f20e40646188870e5c57585dfa9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've come up with some activities geared
toward everyone who was stranded.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4952f20e40646188870e5c57585dfa9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I thought it might be a good way to help
the company bounce back.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="f71baa1cc81540a5a9dc454be2c7bbd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I spoke with Tulbo Real Estate's president,
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf13"/]Chowder[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] He mentioned a planet where
they're developing a resort.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f71baa1cc81540a5a9dc454be2c7bbd5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02FaceOnly"/]I'll be proposing a sightseeing tour soon.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
If that's successful,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our company is
certain to experience a strong recovery!
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="07b812f2cca74e89a671800307e8af46" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Connecting with all these celebrities is a
sure way to get more publicity.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll make
good use of the bonds from this incident![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07b812f2cca74e89a671800307e8af46" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJobFaceOnly"/]Now that I'm alive and safe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't just
stand idle!
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="1b22191af46b4a42a61103b9096479b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] supervises Alayon Academy's
Planetary Science Club.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She'll probably be
the subject of blame and finger-pointing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1b22191af46b4a42a61103b9096479b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]I'm worried about that too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I already have a twisting anxiety forming
in my stomach...
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="f48470775d0e4916939385997d4efda7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is one of the science-club students,
right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She was so calm and collected when
I met her that I thought she was in charge.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="cdeb1b2f53974a6ba0ca0ab3a35006cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was the one providing the in-flight
meals.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cdeb1b2f53974a6ba0ca0ab3a35006cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]When I walked past, I saw [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf14"/]Lapi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s plate and...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]my face.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cdeb1b2f53974a6ba0ca0ab3a35006cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The representation was so photorealistic
that I couldn't believe it was drawn using
sauce.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I nearly dropped a plate.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="e161e342119a49458839af6a7541e0c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It seems [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] got the tour meeting place
wrong,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gave her a good
scolding for it.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="b0a5a136ec334ca98e8d48f981637fb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It's a little embarrassing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'm afraid I
haven't ever had an opportunity to see
any of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf16"/]Boris[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s work.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="ca7250e59b1a4f8cbcb64771e337bafd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal23"/]Horatio[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope it isn't rude of me to
say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but he comes across a bit...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]cagey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
don't you think?
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="c3cb3e54a38c46188940275eb96ac88e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] looks so much like my boss.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's
hard to believe she's only a student given
how she's mastered the art of disciplining.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c3cb3e54a38c46188940275eb96ac88e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]When I think about how upset my boss
might be once I make it back safely...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c3cb3e54a38c46188940275eb96ac88e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't dwell on that right now.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="f340fd929ae54a33807e22a6db31ebf5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf07"/]Molly[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was a bit unsettled when she left
her seat to record a video while we were
traveling faster than the speed of light.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="61cbf0fa7a5d411a98b04154f38b74e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Our company pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf08"/]Santi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], is a temp hire
with amazing skills.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He has some very
impressive experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="61cbf0fa7a5d411a98b04154f38b74e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]It seems like he's changed careers a lot
due to frequent surprise encounters with
a rival he's been trying to avoid.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="2809e51361f94dccac602a2987a93aa3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I hate to tell you this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but we don't allow
pets on our company's tours.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="5cbb6e1b77f44a7e9d324df56229b5e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Maybe we could create a long-term-stay
travel package with pet accompaniment
based on individual customer needs.
LF005.LF005_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="66c785a43edf41d186f5a6a16a3c08b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You look so much like me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I bet no one
would even notice if we swapped places![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I don't suppose you'd want to...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]for a bit...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="66c785a43edf41d186f5a6a16a3c08b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] wouldn't like that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ah well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I just thought it was a great opportunity
for a change of pace.
